triples.name: Unmanned aerial vehicle
triples.relevance: The paper provides a comprehensive overview of research trends and advancements in UAV technology.

triples.name: Artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: The paper discusses artificial intelligence as a key research area for future development in UAVs.

triples.name: Remote sensing
triples.relevance: Remote sensing is identified as a major application area and future development direction for UAV research.

triples.name: Control system
triples.relevance: The paper addresses aircraft control systems and discusses various control techniques and algorithms used in UAV research.

triples.name: Swarm robotics
triples.relevance: The paper explores swarming and cooperative control as potential areas for further development in UAVs.

triples.name: Aircraft flight control system
triples.relevance: Aircraft control systems are a fundamental component discussed in the paper's coverage of UAV hardware and control mechanisms.

triples.name: Communications system
triples.relevance: Communication is highlighted as a crucial research area and future development direction for UAV systems.

triples.name: Scopus
triples.relevance: The paper utilizes Scopus database to quantify and analyze research trends in UAV literature and interconnections.
